outputs.output_descr: This project aims to increase national capacities for monitoring human development and developing relevant policy by enhancing the engagement of UNDP with Statistical Offices and other relevant Government departments in Barbados and the OECS on the global Human Development Report. The project will support activities for the discussion and dissemination of HDR findings as relevant to the region; increase knowledge of the methodology for the improved collection, submission and analysis of the multidimensional country data used in the Human Development Index; and address the use of this data for policy development at the national level.

project_title: Strengthening Capacity to Monitor Human Development
